patterns: how to reach central university of tamil nadu?
responses: Central University of Tamil Nadu is located in Thiruvarur,Tamil Nadu,India; a]Tiruchirappalli / Trichy (120 km away) and Chennai International Airport (299 km) are the nearest airports. b]The nearest railway station is Thiruvarur Junction (TVR), and the connecting stations are Tiruchirappalli Junction (Trichy - TPJ) and Thanjavur Junction in the east, and Mayiladuthurai Junction (MV) in the north. Check the available trains at IRCTC website : https://www.irctc.co.in/nget/train-search e]Train from Chennai Egmore (MS) to Thiruvarur (TVR) runs daily, with two direct trains. The other option by train is to come to Mayiladuthurai, Kumbakonam (KMU), or Thanjavur (TJ) and take a bus from there to Thiruvarur. f]Through Bus : Both government and private buses are available from Chennai to Thiruvarur or Mayiladuthurai. People coming via Tiruchirappalli (Trichy) or Thanjavur will have to take the government buses to Thiruvarur. There are buses available for Thiruvarur from a few significant places like Trivandrum, Nagercoil, Ernakulam, Bangalore, and Chennai l] Check the Buses at TNSTC website https://www.tnstc.in/home.html k]Google maps link : https://goo.gl/maps/eFXLZFm93QU2sfrL8

patterns: how to get admission in Central University of Tamil Nadu (CUTN)?
join in get admission into iM.A / iM.Sc / M.A / M.sc / M.com / MPA / MBA / tourism / B.Ed / LLM / m.tech CUTN ?
tell me the admission process / procedure?
process my admission in iM.A / iM.Sc / M.A / M.sc / M.com / MPA / MBA / tourism / B.Ed / LLM / m.tech?
What is the admission process for iM.A / iM.Sc / M.A / M.sc / M.com / MPA / MBA / tourism / B.Ed / LLM / m.tech?
guid / help me to join in cutn iM.A / iM.Sc / M.A / M.sc / M.com / MPA / MBA / tourism / B.Ed / LLM / m.tech
assist me to secure admission in cutn
Admission for iM.A / iM.Sc / M.A / M.sc / M.com / MPA / MBA / tourism / B.Ed / LLM / m.tech
responses: Write Common University Entrance Test (CUET) for UG/PG get a good mark in the test and at the time of counselling submit your documents in samarath portal of  CUTN (Central University of Tamil Nadu). The candidates are also advised to be in touch with the NTA website(s) https://www.nta.ac.in and https://cuet.samarth.ac.in/ for the latest updates regarding the exam.

patterns: What is the financial support for research scholars?
How to reach CUTN (Central University of Tamil Nadu) from Thiruvarur Railway station ?
responses: 1) Go to Thiruvarur “Old Bus stand” which is walkable distance from the railway station 2) On every weekend (Saturday & Sunday) for the convenience of students CUTN's own bus is provided from Thiruvarur old Bus Stand to CUTN Main Gate. Timings are: a]Pick Up - Thiruvarur Bus Stand by 11:00 AM, 03:00 PM and 05:30 PM respectively and Dropped at CUTN Main Gate by 11:30 AM, 3:30 PM and 6:00 PM respectively. 3) Private buses (kutty) are available directly to the CUTN from the old bus stand. Catch the bus Happily reach the CUTN ** Enquire about bus timings at old bus stand ; * Which is cheap and best way * b]missed the direct bus ----> here is Alternative way 4) There are so many buses available from the old bus stand to reach the place Kangalancherry, which is the closest bus stop to CUTN. Take AUTO from kangalancherry to CUTN; 5) Take AUTO from the Thiruvarur Railway station to CUTN.**Usually auto fares are very high. The fare depends on the situation and your urgency,auto drivers will take advantage of your urgency and demands more money. ** c]Caution: If you are a girl alone at night, do not take unnecessary risks and choose the safest mode of transport.
Refer the following webpage https://cutn.ac.in/deans/

patterns: how to contact dean of students welfare?
responses: Refer the following webpage https://cutn.ac.in/dsw/

patterns: How to reach CUTN through Train ?
how to reach cutn by train
I want to reach by train?
near by railway station to thiruvarur
guid me to reach cutn by train
how to reach cutn from chennai railway station
responses: The nearest railway station is Thiruvarur Junction (TVR), and the connecting stations are Tiruchirappalli Junction (Trichy - TPJ) and Thanjavur Junction (TJ) in the east, and Mayiladuthurai Junction (MV) in the north. Train from Chennai Egmore (MS) to Thiruvarur (TVR) runs daily, with two direct trains. The other option by train is to come to Mayiladuthurai, Kumbakonam (KMU), or Thanjavur (TJ) and take a bus from there to Thiruvarur. a]Check the trains at IRCTC website https://www.irctc.co.in/nget/train-search

patterns: can you tell me the train timings
responses: Refer the IRCTC website : https://www.irctc.co.in/nget/train-search

patterns: How to reach CUTN through Bus?
can you guid me to reach CUTN from chennai
can you guid me to reach CUTN from Tiruchirappalli
can you guid me to reach CUTN from Trichy
can you guid me to reach CUTN from Thanjavur
guid me to reach cutn by bus
responses: Both government and private buses are available from Chennai to Thiruvarur or Mayiladuthurai. People coming via Tiruchirappalli (Trichy) or Thanjavur will have to take the government buses to Thiruvarur. There are buses available for Thiruvarur from a few significant places like Trivandrum, Nagercoil, Ernakulam, Bangalore, and Chennai. a]Check the Buses at TNSTC website https://www.tnstc.in/home.html

patterns: What is the nearest AIRPORT to CUTN ?

responses: Tiruchirappalli / Trichy (120 km away) and Chennai International Airport (299 km) are the nearest airports.

patterns: How secure the girls hostel would be?
Does girls are secure in the campus?
How the girls hostel would be?

Does the campus is safe to girls
what about safty in the campus
responses: Security in the campus is very strict,without a valid document Security won't allow the person to enter into the campus; All the premises and hostels in the campus is covered under CCTV surveillance and caretakers will monitor the hostels 24/7 ;  Girls and boys hostels are very much far away to each other.If you face any issues regarding ragging contact the Anti-Ragging Squad Committee https://cutn.ac.in/anti-ragging-squad/, respective action will be taken by them on the spot and punishments will be very severe.

patterns: What is the hostel Fee structure?
responses: You can found more on the web page by click on the link : https://cutn.ac.in/hostel/# a] Hostel Mess Deposits (Refundable)  - Rs. 3000 /- b] Caution Deposit (Refundable) - Rs. 2000/- c] Room Rent - Per semester - Rs. 2000/- (SC and ST students are exempted for Room Rent)

patterns: what is the mode of payment
responses: All kinds of payments related to CUTN are ONLINE, pay through SBI collect only https://www.onlinesbi.sbi/sbicollect/icollecthome.htm CUTN will not accept physical cash payments.

TELEPHONE : +91 4366 277230 ; INTERNATIONAL : +91 4366 277230 a] EMAIL: admissions@cutn.ac.in  b]For Admission queries only : 9443180353 / 6382775375 / 9489329760 / 9901302124 / 9631240595

patterns: What are the documents required for Admission?
can you tell me documents needed for admission
responses: Documents required for admission: 1)Photo 2) Signature 3) Date of Birth 4) Caste certificate 5) EWS certificate 6) CUET Scorecard 7) Admit Card 8) Class X MARKSHEET & CERTIFICATE (If both are same Upload twice) 9) Class XII MARKSHEET & CERTIFICATE (If both are same Upload twice) 10) Transfer Certificate 11) Admission Fee receipt 12) UG provisional Certificate (for PG admission) 13) Marks memos of all the semester's which you attended in UG.

patterns: Documents required for Hostel Admmission / room?
Required docs for Hostel allotment/ room?
How to get hostel admission / room
How to avail hostel admission / room
responses: To secure the HOSTEL Admission: Keep in hand the following documents and submit at the hostel office In-person on office hours 1) Fill the Hostel Admission form which is downloaded from the CUTN website https://cutn.ac.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Hostel_Application_form_for_New_Admission_10112022.pdf 2) Copy of Admit Card of CUTN 3) Copy of Caste and Income certificate (In case of SC/ST/OBC/EWS) 4) Three passport size photos (Two photos to be affixed and one to be enclosed with the application) 5) Copy of Hostel Fee receipt(E-receipt) 6) For Proof of Residence, any one of the following will be considered: a]Residence Certificate issued by the competent authority  b]Voter ID Card(EPIC) c]Driving License  d]Telephone Bill  d]Aadhar Card e]Passport f]Ration Card g]Bank Passbook (One year old) h]Pay the HOSTEL FEE through SBI collect https://www.onlinesbi.sbi/sbicollect/icollecthome.htm ; For more information refer the webpage https://cutn.ac.in/hostel/

patterns: How to pay Admission Fee usin SBI collect?
How to use SBI collect for Admission fee?
How to pay the admission fee?
how to pay using sbi collect?
can you tell me how to pay fee
guid me to pay admission fee
responses: 1)Open the SBI collect website https://www.onlinesbi.sbi/sbicollect/icollecthome.htm and Search for 'Central University of Tamil Nadu' in the Search bar or 2)Select the 'Educational Institution' in category 3)Type the Educational Institution Name as 'Central University of Tamil Nadu'. 4)Click on the institution name. 5)Choose the appropriate payment category and fill the particulars accordingly a]For Admission: choose 'NEW ADMISSION'. 6)Choose the payment method & pay accordingly. 7)** Fill the Particulars carefully **** Must DOWNLOAD / PRINT the E-receipt. **

responses: As of the date 15/02/2023,mess charge 'per day' is Rs.90/-,which includes : breakfast,lunch and dinner **later time price may change**

patterns: common messs for both girls and boys
responses: On the campus, the mess is separate for boys and girls to avoid overcrowding.

patterns: Does cigarettes are allowed in the campus ?

cigarets / alchol is peremitted in the campus
Does the campus is drug free
ganja is allowed in the campus
responses: Consumption of all kinds of 'psychoactive drugs'(psychoactive substances include a]Alcohol g]Cigarettes h]Ganja b]Caffeine c]Nicotine d]Marijuana e]certain pain medicines. f]Many illegal drugs, such as heroin, LSD,cocaine, and amphetamines are also psychoactive substances. Also called psychotropic substances)  are strictly PROHIBITED inside and around the campus.

patterns: Ragging is allowed in the campus ?

responses: CUTN is a RAGGING free campus.If you face any issues regarding ragging contact the Anti-Ragging Squad Committee https://cutn.ac.in/anti-ragging-squad/, respective action will be taken by them on the spot and punishments will be very severe.

responses: Once the admission process completes CUTN launches a notification about the commencement of classes and also we request you to visit the CUTN website regularly to know the latest updates.

patterns: Facilities for the students in the campus
responses: 1) Free wifi for students in the whole campus 2)Central Library with huge number of book collections both digital and physical books a]Reading room b]Discussion room c]Computer lab d]Online Public Access Catalog(OPAC) http://library.cutn.ac.in/ e]E-Resources f]subscription to many reputed publishers g]Digital Books and Drinking water h]visit the webpage of library to know more about facilities provided for students in the Library http://82.180.173.110/about-us/about-library/  3)Multipurpose Auditorium g]Guest House h]GYM & Play grounds i] Full encouragement of all sports j]NCC K]NSS 4)Primary Health Center(PHC) is situated at the backside of the Amenities hall with AMBULANCE service, for the basic health care of students. 5)Class rooms with DIGITAL BOARD, Media Theater 6)Bus facility for the students, CUTN's own buses are carrying the students from one block to another in the campus and many services from inside to outside of the campus and vice versa. 7)Well equipped science laboratories for each individual department for all science streams in respective disciplines. 8)Highly qualified faculty passionate to teach and learn as well. 9) You can find more on the Facilities tab in the webpage.

Refer the students portal to know more about the scholaships https://cutn.ac.in/students_portal/ and also NSP website https://scholarships.gov.in/, vidyasaarathi portal by NSDL https://www.vidyasaarathi.co.in/Vidyasaarathi/, scholarships and fellowships by UGC https://www.ugc.ac.in/page/scholarships-and-fellowships.aspx and many private organizations are also providing scholarships for students in different aspects check in online **Beware of frauds and scams** Don't be trapped by any fraudsters  follow official websites only.
